archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.3.1: There should be an approved process for providing entities(typically users and sometimes services) with appropriate accounts (e.g. User IDs), access privileges (or rights), and permissions, which should:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
